creditline: Gift of the American Academy and Institute of Arts and Letters, the Hassam and Speicher Purchase Fund
inscription: Inscribed in black ink, verso: UNTITLED / 74' x 37-1/2 | UP (arrow) / (HANG WITH PINS / IN EACH CORNER)
medium: Collage of rice paper, acrylic pigment, and polymer on handmade paper
provenance: American Academy and Institute of Arts and Letters, New York; given to MIA, 1980.
signed: Signed and dated in black ink, verso: Stephen Hartman 1979
title: Untitled No.1
